SEARCH
Module org.myjtools.imconfig
Package org.myjtools.imconfig

Class PropertyDefinition

java.lang.Object
org.myjtools.imconfig.PropertyDefinition
public class PropertyDefinition extends Object
This class instantiates an immutable value object that represents the definition of a given property.

Property definitions can be created manually or read from a YAML file.
